channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus - an animal so large that even its poo was deadly! But if you thought that was the biggest ever dinosaur, then think again. With stunning graphics and epic stunts, featuring a piano smash, a fire hose hose-down and the most powerful heart in the animal kingdom, Steve crowns his king of all beasts.
